articles.description: Figures released today show that in the first quarter of this year she had 8.11million weekly listeners, down from 9.05million in the same period last year when she started.
articles.content:
Zoe Ball's BBC Radio 2 breakfast show has lost nearly a million listeners since she replaced Chris Evans.
Figures released today show that in the first quarter of this year she had 8.11million weekly listeners, down from 9.05million in the same period last y… [+1417 chars]

articles.author: By Andrew Bullock For Mailonline
articles.title: Stephen Fry believes the music of Beethoven saved him from the brink of suicide - Daily Mail
articles.description: Stephen Fry has admitted the musician Ludwig van Beethoven saved him from suicide.
articles.content:
Stephen Fry has admitted the musician Ludwig van Beethoven saved him from suicide.
The TV and film actor, 62, has been open about his struggles with mental health over the years - including that he tried to take his own life in 2012.
But speaking on podcast… [+2780 chars]
